roms.changelog:
- Update Security Patch
- Update stormbreaker kernel
- Misc changes

- Update blobs to MIUI V12.5.5.0.RKHMIXM - rootdir: Allow all filesystems for USB-OTG - props: Increase audio HAL buffer size to 240 - Misc fixes and upstream changes. Kernel: - Merge branch android-4.19-stable of android/kernel/common - Misc fixes and upstream changes. - Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-12-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-12-0-beta.4348617/post-85790097 - Recommend use with fw part MIUI 12.5.5.0 (A11) Global / India / EU.

- Many update. Much wow

Use Arrow Recovery for installation & updates. Recovery & install guide are in the below groups:

XDA: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-un-official-12-beta-arrowos-vanilla-gapps-aosp.4353927/

Telegram: https://t.me/arrowapolloofficial

- sdm845-common:
Update blobs to MIUI polaris V12.5.1.0.QDGCNXM
- beryllium: Update blobs from V12.0.3.0.QEJMIXM
- Update display and adreno blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update WFD blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update OMX codecs and VPP to OnePlus6 R
- Update Configstore blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update Power-off alarm blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update ESE, PerMgr and Time services blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update IRQ balance blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Fixed Smart Charging permissions and sepolicy
- Kernel: Merge android-4.9-q google kernel common (4.9.277)
- Kernel: Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.3.r1-02800-sdm845.0
- Kernel: arch/arm64: dts: disable dfps in jdi fhd panel and ebbg ft8716 panel
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

Add AOSP RCS packages
Remove split permissions

- Partial sync with LOS tree
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Add AOSP RCS packages
Remove split permissions

- Partial sync with LOS tree
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

name: Redmi K40 Pro / Pro+ / Mi 11X Pro / Mi 11i

roms.changelog: Fixed Fingerprint not working issues

- Switch to Pixel Thermal
- Adapt Dynamic Thermal Profile to Pixel thermal-engine
- Switch back to QTI bluetooth stack
- Switch to new ANT stack
- Optimize shutdown time
- Optimize UI performance
- Update sepolicy for S requirement
- Fixed upload speed for traffic indicator
- kernel: Upstream to 4.4.296
- kernel: Dropped duplicated kernel-side pocketmode
- kernel: Add back avb and SafetyNet Patches(SafetyNet still passed without them)
- Other fixes and improvements

• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.261
• Switch to AOSP clang 14.0.1
• Adapt sepolicy to Android 12
• Remove enable_advanced_sf_offset prop
• Disable unspecialized app process pool
• Attach vendor_property_type to properties
• Specify vendor_fp_prop as vendor public prop
• Allow ioctl to zram_swap for performance
• Add aux camera packagelist prop to system props
• Update the transcoding operating rate
• Set SSR restart_level in init.qcom.rc
• Label more wakeup nodes
• Label idle_state sysfs nodes
• Made transition animation a bit faster
• Limit screen recorder frame rate to 60fps
• Adjusting screen timeouts
• Dont inherit updatable_apex.mk
• Disable partial FB excl rect
• Disable global mode and CDMA choices
• Show 4G icon for all carriers
• Only make recovery permissive on non production builds
• Remove TxPower2g and 5g from wifi config file
• Disable all wifi related logging
• Fix OTA auto-flashing with encrypted f2fs
• Set media vol steps to 25
• Kill IMS logspam with fire
• Update config_safe_media_volume_index
• Slightly increase the minimum brightness level
• Use FUSE passthrough by default
• Update vendor security patch level
• Switched back to OpenGL as default GPU renderer
• Import and build GPS stack from LA.UM.9.1.r1-11500-SMxxx0.0
• Increase gps batch size to max
• Lower gps debug level
• Localise NTP to improve GPS TTFF

- Optimize dex flags
- Enable Seamless Transfer
- Address sepolicy denials
- Update blobs to MIUI V12.5.1.0.RJIMIXM
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Kernel:
- Merged CAF tag LA.UM.9.12.r1-12200-SMxx50.QSSI12.0 for msm-4.19 and wlan
- drivers: remove xiaomi early fingerprint wakeup optimization
- usb: pd: Revert some CAF patches (fixed random panic usb)
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Request MIUI Android 11 firmware and vendor.

• Added lawnchair launcher as default
• Fixup status bar padding issues on the lock screen
• Fixup USB-C audio
• Update CarrierSettings from sunfish SQ1A.211205.008
• Switch overlays from build time to RRO
• Copy DispSync offsets from cmi
• Drop surface flinger vsync phase offsets
• Switch to SF phase offsets from redfin
• Sync durations props with raven
• Sync idle/touch timer to raven
• Drop unnecessary fqnames from manifests
• Clean up and uprev fp HAL to 2.3
• Upstream wireguard to 1.0.20211208 snapshot
• Merge Linux version 4.14.258 into the kernel 
• Misc changes

- Fixed Bluetooth can not turn on after turning off
- SELinux enforce
- Fixed GCam
- Fixed aptX
- Fixed FP did not work on some devices
- Added display color compositions

- Update blobs to MIUI polaris V12.5.1.0.QDGCNXM
- Update display and adreno blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update WFD blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update OMX codecs and VPP to OnePlus6 R
- Update Configstore blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update Power-off alarm blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update ESE, PerMgr and Time services blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update IRQ balance blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Fixed Smart Charging permissions and sepolicy
- Kernel: Merge android-4.9-q google kernel common (4.9.277)
- Kernel: Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.3.r1-02800-sdm845.0
- Kernel: arch/arm64: dts: disable dfps in jdi fhd panel and ebbg ft8716 panel
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!
- From now on it is required to be on Q firmware (11.0.3.0 global or more new)

01/08/2021
- Fixed night display
Initial A12 build

Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

- Fixed libcameraservice
- Switch GCamGOPrebuilt

Note: Clean flash mandatory.

12/11/2021
• Improved power management
• Switched back to schedutil governor
• Cleaned unneeded vendor libraries

28/10/2021
• Fixed cutout color being inverted with the "Force dark theme" setting
• Fixed minimum frequency being 1248MHz
• Fixed WFD
• Added Spanish translations to the device specific settings

- Initial release of Community ArrowOS for tucana
- Update redfin fingerprint to November
- Drop fast-charge script (now it is handled in the kernel)
- Bring back audio amplifier
- Address selinux denials

Please check Device,Vendor,Kernel sources and ROM changelogs for actual changes.
You can join support chat for more help.

You can donate to maintainer via: PayPal | UPI: 001KS001@kotak

Also, check out XDA thread to discuss with other users.
Lawnchair

• Added lawnchair launcher as default
• Fixup status bar padding issues on the lock screen
• Fixup USB-C audio
• Update CarrierSettings from sunfish SQ1A.211205.008
• Switch overlays from build time to RRO
• Copy DispSync offsets from cmi
• Drop surface flinger vsync phase offsets
• Switch to SF phase offsets from redfin
• Sync durations props with raven
• Sync idle/touch timer to raven
• Drop unnecessary fqnames from manifests
• Clean up and uprev fp HAL to 2.3
• Upstream wireguard to 1.0.20211208 snapshot
• Merge Linux version 4.14.258 into the kernel 
• Misc changes

- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

Switched to libperfmgr for better performance, battery and less heating.
Some stability improvements.
- Misc changes and improvements
NOTE: For Realme UI 1.0 FW only.

- Fixed USB tethering mode detection with windows
- Updated HALs and rebased kernel on LA.UM.10.2.1.r1-02700-sdm660.0

- Screen might go blank for a minute on the first boot. Wait and let it boot.
